abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book The Girl in the Spider's Web: A Lisbeth Salander Novel, Continuing Stieg Larsson's Millennium Series by David Lagercrantz, translated by George Goulding.
lead_paragraph: The Swedish author David Lagercrantz has picked up this series, centered on the punk hacker Lisbeth Salander and her sometime partner, the investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.

headline.main: Review: ‘The Girl in the Spider’s Web’ Brings Back Stieg Larsson’s Detective Duo
headline.print_headline: Sleuths We Know, Quirks and All

snippet: The Swedish author David Lagercrantz has picked up this series, centered on the punk hacker Lisbeth Salander and her sometime partner, the investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.
